sentence.text: When stratified by tumor histology, three SNPs (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II rs2274971A AAAA G, fructose 6-phosphate metabolic process rs11168417C AAAA T, and cellular response to reactive oxygen species rs3785921G AAAA A) were significantly associated with OS and/or DFS only in squamous cell carcinoma, whereas fructose 6-phosphate metabolic process rs1132173C AAAA T exhibited a significant association with survival outcomes only in adenocarcinoma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
cellular response to reactive oxygen species
